title: Constant bug that riots not fixing
body: Almost every time I try to play a game during champion select or ban select it won't let me lock in my selection and I keep getting dodge timers. I've sent in a ticket almost every single time it's happened but riots doing nothing.

replies.body:
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} 

It *really* sucks when that happens. I know most of the time when it happens to me, it's because my network lost it's connected from slight packet loss or something weird like that. I'd run through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network is setup in the best way, and if it happens *a lot*, I would definitely switch to an ethernet cable instead of wifi.

Have you tried reinstalling the client? This is most likely not a general bug with the client (or many many more people would be experiencing it), but an error in your system's installation of it. You can use the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) Riot has to both reinstall the game from scratch as well as to gather logs to submit to Support if the reinstall doesn't work.
